 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁאָר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ezra.7.20|Ezra 7:20]]</sup> ==rest, remainder== (see Biblical Hebrew I. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁאר‎</span>; Egyptian Aramaic noun <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שאר‎</span> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>203</sup>, verb <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ישתאר‎</span> ***be left*** (outstanding) [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>404</sup> = [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>L 9, Christian-Palestinian</sup> Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁ‎</span> absolute [[Ezra.4.10|Ezra 4:10]] +, construct v[[Ezra.4.9|Ezra 4:9]] +; emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁאָרָא‎</span> [[Dan.7.7|Dan 7:7]]; [[Dan.7.19|Dan 7:19]] — of a thing, ***remainder*** [[Ezra.7.18|Ezra 7:18]]; [[Ezra.7.20|Ezra 7:20]] of cities [[Ezra.4.10|Ezra 4:10]]; [[Ezra.4.17|Ezra 4:17]] of persons v[[Ezra.4.9|Ezra 4:9]] v[[Ezra.4.10|Ezra 4:10]] v[[Ezra.4.17|Ezra 4:17]] 6:16&gt;; [[Dan.2.18|Dan 2:18]], of beasts [[Dan.7.7|Dan 7:7]]; [[Dan.7.12|Dan 7:12]]; [[Dan.7.19|Dan 7:19]].
